website_summaries.verdict: For an exposed-bulb, industrial look, this is an affordable choice that looks great.
pros: This versatile pendant with oil-rubbed bronze adds ambiance to any space
Compatible with LED bulbs and dimmer switches
cons: Edison bulbs won't provide much light

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great piece for the price! It's not a heavy fixture and love that it is adjustable from 15"-45". Perfect for over an island in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the style and the quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday afternoon in perfect condition. Installed last night with zero problems. I did not use any of the extender poles/stems as I wanted it closer to the ceiling over the kitchen bar counter. Love that this fixture is so adaptable. I used the Edison bulbs and it really compliments the style. This is a high quality, great looking fixture at a fabulous price. So much so, that I just bought another one and will use it over the dining table but with the extender poles for a longer drop. One tip I would recommend is to use glass cleaner on the globes, inside and out, prior to installing the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the light looks beautiful over my kitchen island. Company came over and loved it. Had my hubby put a dimmer because the 60 watt bulbs I bought are pretty bright. This light gives a warm glow to my kitchen I get migrains so I hate bright lights. Oh and easy to hang I did it myself and boy was my hubby happy because he didn't have to do it. Thank you for fast delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new farmhouse-look kitchen and dining room! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with my new lighting. I agonized over what to choose. I was going from a bright 6 light fixture to something more understated like this one. I am so happy I chose this. It was easy to assemble and hang. My husband did it in about 15 minutes. I ordered the same bulbs as shown in the pics. It is adorable! Strongly recommend it. The price is better than anywhere else, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger L.

customer_reviews.title: Is OK has a couple issues, looks better with different Edison style bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: My one complain is that if I wanted to use the glass fixtures that it comes with, one of the plastic rings that is meant to screw on to hold the fixture in place doesn't fit properly and wants to slip over the ceramic threads that should hold it. Also mine has a slight bend where the two outer lights are slightly higher than the middle one. It looks a little old fashioned the way it comes, I took out the bulbs and removed the glass fixtures and used "squirrel cage bulbs" and I think it looks better, but to each their own. Bulbs here if anyone else likes the photo:
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGuy

customer_reviews.title: A few months in and still love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light. We have had it for a few months and no issues. We had originally bought it for our dining room table but decided it would look better over our kitchen island. It was super easy to install and looks amazing especially for the price. We also decided to stick with the Edison Bulbs. They are a bit on the dim side but I rather enjoy it and so does the husband.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but crooked
customer_reviews.text: The light looks very nice. No problems there. The problem I have is that it hangs noticeably lower on the right than the left and there no way to adjust it. Also, it should be noted that it didn't come with instructions for installing, adjusting, etc. The only thing that was provided was a single page with directions to turn off the power and a picture of the light. Bought this for my Daughter's house and she really likes it, so now I have to figure out how to get the thing to hang straight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Craig

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The glass globes get REALLY hot. One shattered and cut my leg and arm in the process. Very dangerous! I can’t evem find a replacement globe to replace it AND when I contacted amazon about it they wouldn’t do anything about it or even get me a replacement glove!!!!! ABSURD!!!’nn
customer_reviews.author: All Wrapped Up Decor

customer_reviews.title: Quality fixture at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This was installed over a kitchen sink as a DIY project by using a Westinghouse "recessed light to pendant light conversion kit" purchased from The Home Depot. Using the adjustable rods provided with the light fixture allowed us to adjust and install this at the perfect height. We also purchased and installed the matching 5 light ceiling fixture in the adjoining dining room area. The final step was using an LED, dimmable Edison light bulb. Very pleased with the outcome!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Check fixture before installing!!
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of this fixture over my kitchen island and it was easy to install. After installing it, we immediately noticed that the left metal disc (the part over the glass) was dented in two places. Also, one of the glass shades has a bubble in it. I am going to have to live with these flaws, because I already cut the wire shorter before installing and do not want to take the fixture down and be without a light until a new one comes. Lesson learned. Please check your fixture BEFORE installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Epps

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is a great value. I love the way it looks but the first one I ordered was damaged in the packaging. Amazon replaced it for me but even the second one that came is slightly crooked. I am not going to send it back because it’s such a hassle but I am definitely not 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looks decent value, easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the sloped ceiling adapter, worked great on cathedral ceiling. If lights are aligned ( mine were) with each other, but not quite perpendicular symmetrically (lean more one way than they should) you can adjust it with the set screws. It is a little challenge to get it right, but at least it can be set. Overall quality i would say is average and fair for what i paid. Looks terrific over our kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: Don Holmes

customer_reviews.title: These lights are awesome!! Plus we added Edison Light Bulbs and ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome!! Plus we added Edison Light Bulbs and they came to life!! I highly recommend these pendants!
customer_reviews.author: stuff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fixture, Well Built for the Price, Not so Great Instructions
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this fixture, it met our needs and looks great over our kitchen island. The construction and materials are decent, especially for the price. This matched a Costco fixture/chandelier that we purchased for the dining room table. The instructions are one page with every language under the sun on it. They don't bother to explain which wire is the Neutral or Hot (2 black wires), Google reminded me that the textured/ribbed side is the Neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Rose

customer_reviews.title: Received Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on the fixture for a week or more and when it went on a “Limited Time Deal” I grabbed it! Opening the box to check out the fixture I immediately noticed the shade on the middle fixture was completely bent! I was so put out because I really liked the look of the fixture. PLUS, the day of delivery, we had a electrician at the house installing new light fixtures throughout. Because this fixture was damaged that set us back on time and money. Fortunately, as a prime member free return shipping was offered.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great look and great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean contemporary look. We also had a dimmer switch installed that connects to Alexa. Now we just say, “Alexa, turn on the island lights.” Such an attractive look with our marble island top.
customer_reviews.author: RRH

customer_reviews.title: Decorating on a dime
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute light. If you are shopping with pennies it is a must buy. But the old saying goes. You get what you pay for. Wishing I’d not gone so cheap. It was easy to install and is super cute but the glass is thin on the globes and it is not made well enough to hang even. I think that is due to the design. If you’re a first time home buyer and looking to decorate on the cheap this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Quality hanging light, works well with a sloping ceiling. Rod pieces give a choice for how low you want it to hang. My husband lifted something out of the kitchen sink and hit and broke the globe the first week we had it. After thinking about trying to order a new globe I kind of liked it with a change in the lightbulb to an Edison bulb and the globe wasn't needed for me to say it is still a beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Grandma

customer_reviews.title: More wire protection poles needed
customer_reviews.text: The light fixture looks very nice and closely matches the picture. The only issue I had is that I have tall ceilings, approximately 18 feet. The wire that was provided was long enough to bring the lights to a good height, but the poles that protect the wire are much shorter than the wire length that was provided. I had to reach out to Globe Electric to get 3 additional poles. They ended up charging me $5 per pole and $15 to ship. It took 3 weeks to get the additional poles.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this light fixture! It was extremely easy to install and it goes perfect with our rustic/primitive kitchen! We used 60watt Edison Bulbs. I have had numerous compliments on how beautiful it is! What a great deal for the price! I also love that you can rotate it once instealled to be vertical or horizontal (which is great since I constantly change up the position of my kitchen table)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lignt
customer_reviews.text: Beyond happy with thia product. Despite the price it is VERY well made and feels very strong. The metal is not cheap and it is bigger than I excepted for the price. I LOVE this light. My only LITTLE complaint is on of the glass pieces for the lights has an imperfection, like a bubble in the glass but you can hardly notice when on.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Parent

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This fixture has been used for over 3 months. We love it. It took us over an hour to install; however, given the slope of the ceiling and our house's quaint electrical system - we were delighted it went in so easily. The light it provides is wonderful. It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value!
customer_reviews.text: We did not use the extensions, simply attached to the beam in our under roof outdoor kitchen. Chose this in place of another fixture that was over 10x the cost because it was outdoor rated. Seriously if it only last two years we are miles ahead and everyone that sees it thinks we spent a lot more!
customer_reviews.author: Trey B.

customer_reviews.title: Great dining light fixture, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this adorable light! Adds so much of a modern upgrade to our dining area and it was so affordable compared to other dining room fixtures! Pretty easy to assemble, but we couldn’t really figure out at first how to take a rod off to shorten the length of it, once we figured that out it was simple! Definitely will need to buy the edison light bulbs for it, regular light bulbs blind your eyes when the light is on.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We installed this light over the bar/island in our kitchen where there was an existing can light. It works perfectly and looks great. We did have to get a conversion kit from a local big-box store just because the hole from the can light was larger than the 'base' of the fixture. But overall the installation was quick and easy -- took my husband less than 30 minutes. The extension 'pole' of the light comes in 3 sections so it is easy to remove one of the sections and cut the power cord so you get the exact length that you need. Would totally recommend this light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: CMartinGA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, this is a great product that is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I had trouble deciding which light to choose for my farmhouse style decor. I wasn’t sure this was going to be the one, but once it was installed, I knew I made the right choice. My product was free of the previously mentioned blemishes and was a great value for the money. The local options were much higher priced. I am very happy with this product and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jbrad80

customer_reviews.title: Great light - GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this light! The height is great for our island! It is just enough of a touch of industrial to look good. It also is compatible with our dimmer. I bought the light bulbs They recommended and I really like the glow..which is easy on thdinner. If you're on the fence..buy it!! *UPDATE To clean the glass I take a lint-free towel spray a little vinegar on it and as you can see from the pictures I use a wooden spoon handle and Jet Li just Swirl It Up in around the light bulb takes a few minutes and they are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: Looks classy
customer_reviews.text: We installed this over our kitchen island. It looks great! Simple enough to not distract, but nice looking and good quality. The glow from the bulbs are bright enough for kitchen prep but doesn’t blind you. The bulbs do get warm though and create a little heat.
customer_reviews.author: Spotstephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our Grand Daughter, and she loves it. She hung it over her kitchen counter, and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: vegas1026

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived damaged so was worried there might be broken or damaged pieces but everything was ok. A little difficult to install. Took my son about three hours. Love it, though. Have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kim in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for flat ceilings!
customer_reviews.text: I like the light but it was such a pain to install this light. We have slanted cathedral ceilings and the issue was the bars are pinstraight leaving no slack to flush with the ceiling. The instructions were useless. But hey we made it work. We do like how the light looks. Still gave it 5 stars because I feel if we didn’t have slanted ceilings it would have been much easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the fluorescent light panel in my kitchen with this. I love it. I gave it 4 stars on install because I did it myself on a slanted ceiling (just a little difficult to hold light by yourself).
customer_reviews.author: blkwida

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kitchen remodel. Only downside is it shows dust easily but that's to be expected with a black fixture and glass. Would recommend to anyone looking for an inexpensive yet nice-looking fixture for an island.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Casual style 3 light pendant provides great light, easy to reach bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Provides lots of light on my counter, just like I needed. Design works in my kitchen: not fancy,. The main reason I purchased was so I could replace bulbs without using a ladder. I was a little worried about the weight considering the small base, but the installer said it was fine, and it has been. Didn't have any problems getting it level as some other people mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: AAC

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one, our first was the three bulb we got to go over our center island. This one is over our 8ft farm table, it looks awesome! The only thing we’re havibg trouble with is the bulbs. Since it has 4 spots and is really only 5 or so feet away from our 3 bulb one, it’s like as bright as a stadium!! So we’re working with that but that’s no quality issue. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Catapano

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed with this light fixture!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this light fixture. I was a little hesitant to buy a light fixture from amazon without the ability to physically see it first. Don’t be nervous, buy this! I promise you won’t regret it. Everyone compliments it, and is so surprised when I tell them I got it off amazon. Great price for how high quality it is as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Cook

customer_reviews.title: which then nearly exploded my bulb (atleast it sounded like it). The fixture that burnt out will not ...
customer_reviews.text: This fixture did not work for more than 2 hours. I was standing next to it when I heard a shorting noise, which then nearly exploded my bulb (atleast it sounded like it). The fixture that burnt out will not light anymore bulbs. Also, it came with 2 black wires and a ground. It should have a black (hot), white (neutral), and ground. Unfortunately I had purchased it for a house I had not closed on yet, and it is past the return date. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Caylin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just installed today and I love it. It was super easy to put up and it arrived in perfect condition. Love the look of it for our dining room. Gave the space a more updated look. You can’t beat the price for this! We have the 3 bulb one in the kitchen so it has a good consistent flow of lighting now. Super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture! Very easy install! And you can turn the light to go in the direction you need for your table which is good because I move my table around regularly! Everyone asks where I purchased! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley DiNapoli

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my daughters new house. She absolutely loves it. Amazing styling, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spallino

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture - the price is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this light fixture to update the outdated chandelier that hangs over our kitchen table. I can't believe how expensive this looks when hung for the price we paid. We tried the Edison bulbs but found the light to be too yellow for our taste so switched back to more traditional bulbs with white light that look great. I cannot believe how many people have complimented this item and wanted to purchase it themselves after seeing it in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Kat McCreery

customer_reviews.title: Highlight of the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, arrived securely packed and easy to install. I have this over my kitchen island and use them withwhich provides plenty of light. Very pleased with this buy. It's a good size without being intrusive, and has garnered lots of compliments from guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Affordable Price!
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture blew me away. It is such great quality at an extremely affordable price! Super easy to install. I did it all by myself and it was my first time doing anything like that! It looks amazing! So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Loved this pendant chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something modern but understated for out dining room lighting. For the price, I couldn't pass this up and I couldn't be happier. Its great quality and provides a lot of light for the table. The only concern I'll say is that even though it was straight forward to install, the negative and positive wires were not marked so it was a shot in the dark. Luckily we got it right the first time. That's the reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rustic/Industrial Home Decor
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Great price and looks really good over my kitchen table. I ended up using soft white LED bulbs because the Edison style bulbs ended up being to yellowish for my green dining room (so if you plan on going this route I would recommend testing the color of the bulbs first since the clear shades don't dim the light/color at all). Anyway I love my new fixture!
customer_reviews.author: emmykins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So perfect over dining room table and complements the farmhouse decor. Easy to install and priced much lower than in home improvement stores in the area.
customer_reviews.author: Candis M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome in our kitchen! It was really easy to install (says my husband) and we have an old house where nothing usually works out easily. Really great for over our kitchen island because it also serves as the light for the rest of the kitchen. We also found vintage bulbs that are LED so it's also energy efficient! Overall great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but looks high end!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very high end in our kitchen that we've been remodeling, but at a inexpensive price compared to any big box stores! We also bought the matching semi flush mount matching light to put over our sink and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna S

customer_reviews.title: I love the price too
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to add a rustic touch to our Tahoe home. These lights are exactly what I was looking for. I love the price too. My hubby had no problem getting all 3 up quickly
customer_reviews.author: Breenclan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fixture. I’ve been searching for a decently priced modern light fixture and this is it! Super easy to install. I didn’t use any of the adjustable rods to have it the shortest distance possible. We cut the wires to be shorter, too, and everything is working perfectly. The lights are a little dim... but better than my old lights so not complaining. Definitely worth the $!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Igou

customer_reviews.title: Nice light fixture over dining room table.
customer_reviews.text: Goes together quickly. Like the rubbed bronze finish. Lamp glass is nice and heavy. Bulbs are not included, so if you want those nice Edison bulbs or LED equivalents make sure to order them too.
customer_reviews.author: bluesfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Pendant Lights for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. It looks great and goes with almost any decor. Installed it while cooking dinner and was done just in time for dinner. Bought Edison style bulbs but found the light too harsh and too yellow and yet not bright enough. Installed frosted LED's but too bright. Will need to install a dimmer switch and replace with dimmable bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jingo

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit surprised at how well machined this light is during the install. Usually one at this price means having to tweak, file, or bend the parts to make them fit. This one went up easily and looks great. At the same time I bought the semi-flush single bulb light and it too was an easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Prudent

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Put this over our pool table. Looks great. My son broke one of the light covers. It was a little difficult to find a replacement. The one we found looked the same but weighed a bit more than the others. We were able to put it on one of the inside lights to balance it. Still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it look fabulous, it arrived in incredibly record time. The poor mail lady had to drag it up to my door, but other than that, I just cannot believe what a quality-seeming fixture this is. Totally transformed the room, easy to install, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Thanks, Amazon for the great service.
customer_reviews.text: I receive a lot of compliments on this lamp. The hanging rod (unextended) is a perfect length for over my bar. I like that it has the look of three lights with only having to wire one item. It first arrived with a broken globe, but I was provided with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money and good vintage look.
customer_reviews.text: As described - looks nice for the money. One shade has blemish and instructions are not good so novices don't try. I put it up and needed to put a makeshift spacer to make it work. All in all nice for the price. It's not high end by any means but the price reflects that. The vintage lights could turn some people off becasue of the lights color. Overall quality from 1-10 it's a 5&1/2
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, decent quality, looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am overly happy with this light, I was fully planning on spending upwards of $400 for one for the dining room but when I ran across I decided to give it a shot. I used none of the extensions and mounted it as close to the ceiling as possible since I am 6'4", and I clear it. I bought some Edison style bulbs and installed a dimmer also, the end all is for the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Wado Potato

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. This was to replace a fluorescent builder grade light over my kitchen island and it completely transformed my kitchen. Not only that, it was a total steal of a deal. Don't let this sit on your wish list forever. Buy it. Install it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this light for over our dining room table, and it could not be more perfect. There are length options, which is great! It was easy to install, and looks even better than the pictures! The Edison lights put off a perfect light for dining room, bright enough, but still a soft light. You will not be sorry with this light!
customer_reviews.author: EEM201203

customer_reviews.title: Arrived and is as described.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our new house, now being constructed. I received the light to be used in the dining room promptly and in excellent condition. Since the house is yet to be completed, it has not been installed yet, so I can't say how it works yet. I am confident it will be perfect for the space. If there is a complaint later, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Lindylou

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected, hard to clean, heated up an already warm room
customer_reviews.text: The metal is thin and cheap. (In fairness, the price is very low.) There is a short attachment or a long one (that makes it low over your table, like a poker table light). No in between. It attracted and showed dust so fast and was not easy to clean. The lights heated up the dining room which was already on the West side of my Tucson home. I replaced it and put this one in my front yard with a FREE sign on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! The metal and glass are good quality and the option to extend the length is very nice and easy to work with. I have one extension bar in, but it comes with three if you have a higher ceiling. I didn’t like the look of the Edison bulbs so I just used dimmable LED bulbs. It looks great. Installation could not have been easier and it came with all the parts necessary. A screwdriver and a ladder or stepstool is all that you will need.
customer_reviews.author: TJE

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This light was a great value! Easy to install. I loved the style and the price. We altered the height because we weren’t putting it in a room with a high ceiling. Love it, now I need to purchase clear light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Sorely disappointed since the light looks beautiful online
customer_reviews.text: Once installed we realized the entire frame of the light is off center and bent - the whole thing is crooked and looks awful. Quality control badly needed at this company. Sorely disappointed since the light looks beautiful online.
customer_reviews.author: Nams

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Fixture!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are renovating an old double wide and I picked these for the kitchen lighting. Love them!! I have the four light fixture in the dining room. It gives out more than enough light!! I chose these because they work if you have sloped ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but mine hung crooked to one end so I put small black magnets underneath to balance it out instead of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not without defect
customer_reviews.text: Wired it to plug into a wall outlet. It’s very attractive, and great for the price. But like other reviewers mentioned, it came with some dents that I was unable to get out, and one of the lights tilts in an odd direction, as if it was constructed poorly to begin with... poor quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Slight damage, otherwise beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Middle portion is bent. It was well package, so not sure if it happened prior to shipping or during. It is beautiful out up. Trying to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and absolutely beautiful! Provides just the right amount of dining room light with Edison bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER value!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for several months now & I'm thrilled with it. Updated light over our kitchen table. Love the clear glass!! But keeping it clean isn't always fun ;) Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Spreadkindness

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED!
customer_reviews.text: Used this light to replace a fluorescent light in my kitchen. We decided to build the box around it instead of patching the holes in the ceiling used to mount the fluorescent light. We also bought the single one for over the sink. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. My husband had to get alittle crafty but it worked! It was way to long for above our kitchen island. After a little time he managed to make it work. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Magan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Looks lovely in my kitchen with Eddison bulbs. Contractor didn't have issues hanging it. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ChoosyChels

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Beautiful Light Fixture : )
customer_reviews.text: OMG, please don't hesitate to buy this light fixture. It is simply Beautiful : ) I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The only issue was that’s the part that attaches to the ceiling is larger than our existing opening, so it didn’t fit as it was supposed to. Also the instructions are terrible and the way you have to screw in some screws would require you coming in from above, but the ceiling is there so it’s impossible. It looks really nice and is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby warren

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice light. I removed all of the rods, otherwise it would have been too long over the kitchen sink. The metal is a bit thin, therefore somewhat fragile it you are going to install it yourself you must be careful not to bend or break it. Overall, very nice. The photo is upside down for some reason!
customer_reviews.author: K. Toran

customer_reviews.title: Great fixture Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Great lighting fixture super easy to install and looks great. We've received many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Easy to install and looks awesome with farmhouse decor. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light!! We bought it as an open box so got an even better deal. Great price and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Laura

customer_reviews.title: The price was great, and it looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for my kitchen. The price was great, and it looks really nice. Edison bulbs are definitely the way to go, but it is a matter of opinion! Any clear bulb would work. It is missing a start because one of the glass covers was scratched when I received it. I don't have the time to fuss with it, but thought I should mention it here.
customer_reviews.author: kimb34

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the price and it was a style that went with our kitchen. My husband and I installed it ourselves with only basic knowledge of how to do something electrical. Honestly, it's a little crooked but I think that's on us not the light. Nice long wires, too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ya boi

customer_reviews.title: More light  for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Really improved single pendent bathroom light it replaced. Get decorative. Bulbs for best appearance
customer_reviews.author: JGal

customer_reviews.title: Looks great above my rustic/industrial acacia kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: Looks great above my rustic/industrial acacia kitchen table. I bought the 4 light version and it works perfectly with my 82" table. We get a lot of compliments over this fixture. The price was great too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lwalsh

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for the price - Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, package and product came in great shape and exactly as advertised. East to install. Very happy with purchase and quality of product
customer_reviews.author: N Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light. Buy the Edison bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly very nervous buying a light online, especially having read the negative reviews. But it’s just perfect!! We. Love it! And I’m so glad for the light bulb suggestions! They look perfect together!
customer_reviews.author: jeff and karen newton

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful in person, Looks so nice over my center island in the kitchen. I am so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: caral0907

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and cute. Installing was tricky but that might have been our fault. Only reason I give it 4 out of 5 is because one lamp was slightly bent not too noticeable though and lamp wobbles from ceiling if you touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Minelly Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pendant for our kitchen island!
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely in love with this light! I bought it to go over our kitchen island and it is beautiful! It gives off great light and has an adjustable length! It was the perfect addition to our home which is decorated in industrial farmhouse decor.
customer_reviews.author: Fortune11

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend, I love this piece.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a beautiful pendant. Recently fixed up my dining room and this was part of the re-do, it works beautifully and looks modern without looking too niche. I used amber colored edison-style LED bulbs and they set it off gorgeously.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. It is unique and very subtle and matches anything. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Aaroe

customer_reviews.title: Nice edition to dining area
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be very pretty above our dining set. Only downside is the glass is quite cheap but the set is pretty cheap in general. It always looks like it has a film on it. It does put off plenty of light for our area. Pretty with Edison bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I get so many compliments on this light! It ...
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this light! It hangs in my dining room. I will say it's a little hard to clean because the glass is not removable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and looks great hanging over my kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and looks great hanging over my kitchen island. We had an electrician install it because there was no opening where I wanted it. If we had hung it where an existing 'socket' was, we probably would have been able to do it ourselves. We bought the Edison light bulbs to go in it and it is exactly the look we wanted... rustic elegance.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Chic
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a bit of an issue installing because this chandelier was replacing a ceiling fan and because the screws given were a bit too small. Otherwise, this is a great light fixture, it works nicely with the new industrial look that's trending right now. It isn't too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: These are great lights- installed with Edison Bulbs and they look beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights- installed with Edison Bulbs and they look beautiful over my island. The rod comes in about 6-8 inch lengths- so there is a lot of variety in the height you can choose to install them at. Very affordable! Like other customers noted- there is a white sticker with specs on bulb size on the underside- you can leave it- it isn't that noticeable- because how many people look directly at a light, or you can remove- with little "goo gone" type cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Add me to the list of people who received a crooked fixture. My house is a new build and hasn't even had a chance to settle. My ceilings are not sloped or uneven. The metal frame on this fixture is visibly off and bent. I could attempt to bend the frame to straighten it, but this is not made of the sturdiest metal. I fear the entire thing would simply snap. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MissFitnessLyss

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: While they look really good, the amber bulbs take some getting used to. They’re not quite as bright as we’re used to. However l, we plan on replacing them with clear. Other than that we love our new lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love this fixture! I decided to not use the glass pieces over the bulbs just for the look I wanted, but I am very satisfied with this product. The bronze is beautiful and it looks great with the Edison bulbs I used in it. Doesn't come with bulbs, but for the price of this I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Bixby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value, awesome piece. We have it over our dining room table and constantly get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: RCM

product_meta.title: Nate 3-Light Pendant, Oil Rubbed Bronze, Clear Glass Shades,64845
product_meta.description: Color:Oil-rubbed Bronze| Style:3-LightFashioned after vintage inspired lighting Globe Electric’s Nate 3-Light Vintage Pendant adds a rustic industrial feel to any room. Hanging from a metal rod that can be adjusted in three places you can customize this fixture to your desired look and lighting needs. Fully compatible with dimmable LED bulbs and dimmer switch the clear glass shades and exposed bulbs easily create lighting ambiance and different moods. Ideal for use in kitchens, restaurants, bars, and dining rooms. Includes all mounting hardware for quick and easy installation and requires three 60W E26 vintage inspired light bulbs (sold separately).
feature_bullets: VINTAGE INSPIRED: fashioned after vintage inspired lighting the three light pendant is perfect for bringing a turn-of-the-century industrial look to any area
ADJUSTABLE: three 9.85" metal hanging rods can be manipulated to customize the fixture to your lighting needs and desired look
DIMMABLE: fully dimmable with compatible dimmer switch to create the perfect atmosphere (dimmer switch sold separately)

EASY INSTALL: includes all mounting hardware for quick and easy installation - Maximum Hanging Length: 45.11"; Minimum Hanging Length: 25"; Each Rod: 9.85" - can be installed on a sloped or vaulted ceiling
BULB REQUIREMENTS: 3x E26/Medium Base 60W Bulbs (sold separately)
✔ ADJUSTABLE: metal hanging rod adjusts in three places allowing you to customize the fixture to your lighting needs and desired look
✔ DIMMABLE: fully dimmable with compatible dimmer switch to create the perfect atmosphere
✔ EASY INSTALL: includes all mounting hardware for quick and easy installation
✔ VINTAGE INSPIRED: fashioned after vintage inspired lighting the three light pendant is perfect for bringing a turn-of-the-century industrial look to any area
✔ BULB REQUIREMENTS: 3x 60W Max E26 Bulbs (sold separately)
